string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Sehemu ya barua pepe ya uthibitisho wakati wa kusajili hazina ya Lichess:
Iwapo haukujisajili na Lichess unaweza kuupuuza ujumbe huu kwa niaba ya usalama.
